mapper.insert:
select seq_board.nextval from dual
insert into board( board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date ) values( #{boardNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date from board order by board_no desc
select board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date from board where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_date = sysdate where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select:
select board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date from board where 1=1
and title like '%'||#{title}||'%'
order by board_no desc
